behavior place_egg_in_pot(egg:item, pot:item):

['1. Fill a pot with water and place it on the stove.', '2. Turn on the stove and wait for the water
 to boil.', '3. Place the egg in the boiling water and cook for the desired time.', '4. Remove the b
oiled egg from the pot and cool it down.']

def is_near_faucet(sink:item):
    # Check whether a faucet is close to a sink
    symbol near_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
    return near_faucet

behavior fill_with_water(pot:item, faucet:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(pot)

behavior place_on_stove(pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        achieve on(pot, stove)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        # Select a pot
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink
        if is_near_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            fill_with_water(pot, faucet)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        place_on_stove(pot, stove)

Goal Representation:
behavior fill_and_place_pot(pot:item, sink:item, stove:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, pot)
        # Move the character closer to the pot
        achieve close_char(char, sink)
        # Move the character closer to the sink
        achieve inside(pot, sink)
        # Place the pot in the sink to fill it with water
        achieve has_water(pot)
        # Fill the pot with water
        achieve close_char(char, stove)
        # Move the character closer to the stove
        achieve on(pot, stove)
        # Place the pot on the stove

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        # Select a pot
        
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink
        
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Select a stove
        
        fill_and_place_pot(pot, sink, stove)
